title: Itâ€™s Raining Men
lyrics:
[intro] (Em) 
 
Hu(Em)midity is rising, barometer's getting low
According to our sources, the (B7)street's the place to go
Cause to(Em)night for the first time
(Am)Just about half-past ten
For the (B)first time in history
It's (B7)gonna start raining meeeen (B7-stop)
 
[chorus]
It's raining (C)men! Halle(D)lujah! - It's raining (B)men! A(Em)men!
I'm gonna (Am)go out to run and let myself get
(B)Absolutely (B7)soaking wet! (B7)
 
[chorus]
It's raining (C)men! Halle(D)lujah! - It's raining (B)men! Every (Em)Specimen!
(Am)Tall, blonde, dark and lean
(B)Rough and tough and (B7)strong and mean (B7)
 
(Cmaj7)God bless Mother (D)Nature, (B7) she's a single (Em)woman too
(Cmaj7) She took from the (D)heavens (B7) and she did what she (Em)had to do
(Cmaj7) She taught every (D)angel (B7) to rearrange the (Em)sky
So that (C)each and every woman
Could (B7)find her perfect guuuuy (B7-stop)
 
[chorus]
It's raining (C)men! Halle(D)lujah! - It's raining (B)men! A(Em)men!
It's raining (C)men! Halle(D)lujah! - It's raining (B)men! A(Em)meeeeen!
(Em)  (Em)  (Em)
 
[bridge]
(Em)I feel stormy (G)weather moving (C)in
A(B)bout to begin
(Em)Hear the thunder
(G)Don't you lose your (C)head!
(B)Rip off the roof and stay in bed (B) (Rip off the roof and stay in bed)
 
(Cmaj7)God bless Mother (D)Nature, (B7) she's a single (Em)woman too
(Cmaj7) She took from the (D)heavens (B7) and she did what she (Em)had to do
(Cmaj7) She taught every (D)angel (B7) to rearrange the (Em)sky
So that (C)each and every woman
Could (B7)find her perfect guuuuy (B7-stop)
 
It's raining (C)men! Halle(D)lujah! - It's raining (B)men! A(Em)men!  x4
[end on last Em-single strum]
